flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: It swallows anything whole.nIt sweats toxic fluids from itsnfollicles to douse foes.
It swallows anything whole.nIt sweats toxic fluids from itsnfollicles to douse foes.
It swallows anything whole.nIt sweats toxic fluids from itsnfollicles to douse foes.
When SWALOT spots prey, it spurts outna hideously toxic fluid from its poresnand sprays the target.fOnce the prey has weakened, thisnPOKéMON gulps it down whole with itsncavernous mouth.
SWALOT has no teeth, so what itneats, it swallows whole, no matter what.nIts cavernous mouth yawns widely.fAn automobile tire could easily fitninside this POKéMON’s mouth.
Its powerful stomach acid is capable ofndigesting almost anything. The one thingnin the whole world a SWALOT can’t digest isnits own stomach.
It can swallow a tire whole in one gulp.nIt secretes a horribly toxic fluid fromnthe pores on its body.
It can swallow a tire whole in one gulp.nIt secretes a horribly toxic fluid fromnthe pores on its body.
It swallows anything whole.nIt sweats toxic fluids from itsnfollicles to douse foes.
It swallows anything whole.nIt sweats toxic fluids from itsnfollicles to douse foes.
It swallows anything whole.nIt sweats toxic fluids from itsnfollicles to douse foes.
It gulps anything that fits in itsnmouth. Its special enzymes canndissolve anything.
It gulps anything that fits in itsnmouth. Its special enzymes canndissolve anything.
Il avale tout en une bouchée. Sesnfollicules sécrètent des fluidesntoxiques qui endorment l’ennemi.
It swallows anything whole.nIt sweats toxic fluids from itsnfollicles to douse foes.
Il avale tout en une bouchée. Sesnfollicules sécrètent des fluidesntoxiques qui endorment l’ennemi.
なんでも　まるのみしてしまう。nけあなから　もうどくの　たいえきをnぶんぴつして　てきに　あびせかける。
무엇이든 통째로 삼켜 버린다.n모공에서 맹독의 체액을n분비하여 상대에게 끼얹는다.
Il avale tout en une bouchée. Ses follicules sécrètentndes fluides toxiques qui endorment l’ennemi.
Es verschluckt alles in einem Stück und sondertngiftige Stoffe ab, mit denen es Gegner besprüht.
Se traga cualquier cosa de una pieza. Sus porosnsegregan fluidos tóxicos que dañan a sus enemigos.
Inghiotte intera qualsiasi cosa. Dai pori traspiranun liquido tossico con cui bagna i nemici.
It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluidsnfrom its follicles to douse foes.
なんでも　まるのみしてしまう。n毛穴から　猛毒の　体液をn分泌して　敵に　浴びせかける。
くちに　はいる　おおきさの　ものならnなんでも　まるのみ。とくしゅなnいえきで　なんでも　しょうかする。
입에 들어가는 크기의 것이라면n무엇이든 통째로 삼킨다. 특수한n위액으로 무엇이든 소화한다.
Il avale tout en une bouchée. Ses sucs digestifsnpeuvent digérer n’importe quoi.
Es verschluckt, was in sein Maul passt, und verdaut esnmit seiner alles zersetzenden Magensäure.
Se traga todo lo que le quepa en su enorme boca.nSus jugos gástricos pueden digerir cualquier cosa.
Inghiotte qualunque cosa che possa infilarsi innbocca. Digerisce tutto con succhi gastrici speciali.
It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its specialnenzymes can dissolve anything.
口に　入る　大きさの　ものならnなんでも　まる飲み。特殊なn胃液で　なんでも　消化する。
えものを　みつけると　けあなから　もうどくのnたいえきを　ふきだして　あびせかけるぞ。nよわった　ところを　おおきな　くちで　ペロリ。
먹이를 발견하면 모공에서 맹독의n체액을 뿜어내어 끼얹는다.n약해지면 커다란 입으로 한입에 먹는다.

Lorsqu’Avaltout repère une proie, il libère une substancenterriblement toxique de ses pores et en enduit son enneminpour l’affaiblir. Ce Pokémon peut ensuite l’avaler d’un coupndans sa gigantesque bouche.

Wenn Schlukwech Beute sichtet, verspritzt es eine höchstngiftige Substanz aus seinen Poren und besprüht damit seinnZiel. Wenn die Beute geschwächt ist, schluckt es sie mitnseinem riesigen Maul im Ganzen herunter.

Cuando Swalot detecta una presa, echa por los poros, y anborbotones, un fluido tóxico espantoso con el que rocía a sunvíctima. Una vez que la debilita, se la traga entera gracias anla gigantesca boca que tiene.
Quando individua la preda, Swalot spruzza sul bersaglionun ripugnante fluido tossico dai propri pori. Una voltanindebolito l’avversario, Swalot lo ingoia intero con la boccansimile a una voragine.
When Swalot spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluidnfrom its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey hasnweakened, this Pokémon gulps it down whole with itsncavernous mouth.
獲物を　見つけると　毛穴から　猛毒のn体液を　吹き出して　浴びせかけるぞ。n弱った　ところを　大きな　口で　ペロリ。
はが　１ぽんも　ないので　なんでも　まるのみ。nいっぱいに　あけた　くちは　とても　おおきくnじどうしゃの　タイヤだって　すっぽり　はいるぞ。
이빨이 하나도 없어서 무엇이든 통째로 삼킨다.n최대한 벌린 입은 정말 커서n자동차 타이어마저도 쑥 들어간다.
Avaltout n’a pas de dents, ce qui le force à tout avaler ennune bouchée. Quand il bâille, sa bouche prend une taillenimpressionnante, et on pourrait y placer une roue de voiture.
Schlukwech hat keine Zähne. Alles was es isst, schluckt es imnGanzen herunter. Sein Maul ist so riesig, dass mit Leichtigkeitnein Autoreifen hineinpassen würde.
Swalot no tiene dientes, así que lo que come se lo traga denuna vez; da igual lo que sea. A este Pokémon le cabría unnneumático en la boca sin problema.

Swalot non ha denti, così quando mangia ingoia ogni cosanintera, senza masticare. Quando sbadiglia, la sua boccanenorme si apre a mo’ di voragine. È così grande che potrebbencontenere persino uno pneumatico.
Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, nonmatter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobilentire could easily fit inside this Pokémon’s mouth.
歯が　１本も　ないので　なんでも　丸のみ。nいっぱいに　開けた　口は　とても　大きくn自動車の　タイヤだって　すっぽり　入るぞ。
